Package com.dragonboat.game

Class PowerUp

java.lang.Object
com.dragonboat.game.Obstacle
com.dragonboat.game.PowerUp
Direct Known Subclasses:
Invincibility, Maneuverability, Repair, SpeedBoost, TimeReduction
public class PowerUp
extends Obstacle
Represents an obstacle on the course.
See Also:
Maneuverability, Invincibility, Repair, TimeReduction, SpeedBoost
